title: Part 210 - Uniform Civil Rules for the City Courts outside the City of New York
content:
Part 210 - Uniform Civil Rules for the City Courts outside the City of New York

State Regulations

§ 210.2 - Terms and parts of court
§ 210.3 - Individual assignment system; structure

§ 210.6 - Summons
§ 210.7 - Pleadings
§ 210.8 - Calendaring of motions; uniform notice of motion form
§ 210.9 - Motion procedure
§ 210.10 - Preliminary conference
§ 210.12 - Videotape recording of depositions

§ 210.15 - Transfer of actions
§ 210.16 - Discontinuance of civil actions
§ 210.17 - Notice of trial where all parties appear by attorney

§ 210.20 - Special preferences

§ 210.28 - Absence of attorney during trial
§ 210.31 - Restoration after jury disagreement, mistrial or order for new trial
§ 210.32 - Damages, inquest after default; proof
§ 210.33 - Submission of orders, judgments and decrees for signature
§ 210.36 - Infants' and incapacitated persons' claims and proceedings
§ 210.37 - Executions
§ 210.38 - Appeals
§ 210.39 - Procedures for the enforcement of money judgments under CPLR article 52
§ 210.40 - Arbitration

§ 210.415 - Renumbered

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
